import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-group', templateUrl: './create-group.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-group.component.css'], }) export class CreateGroupComponent { formData = { groupName: '', }; submitForm(): void { console.log('Form data:', this.formData); // Add your form submission logic here } }
